content.value:
YES I voted Leave
YES it was a mistake
YES I fell for slogans
YES I thought I was sticking it to the establishment
YES I am entitled to regret it
YES you can call me a tw*t if it makes you feel better
YES I can still call out people who are still convinced it’s a good idea
content.html: YES I voted Leave YES it was a mistake YES I fell for slogans YES I thought I was sticking it to the establishment YES I am entitled to regret it YES you can call me a tw*t if it makes you feel better YES I can still call out people who are still convinced it’s a good idea
